00020 //! \brief
00021 //! dot product operation 
00022 
00023 class op_dot
00024   {
00025   public:
00026   
00027   template<typename eT>
00028   inline arma_hot arma_pure static eT direct_dot(const u32 n_elem, const eT* const A, const eT* const B);
00029   
00030   template<typename eT>
00031   inline arma_hot arma_pure static eT direct_dot(const u32 n_elem, const eT* const A, const eT* const B, const eT* C);
00032   
00033   template<typename T1, typename T2>
00034   arma_inline arma_hot static typename T1::elem_type apply(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X, const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T2>& Y);
00035   
00036   template<typename T1, typename T2>
00037   inline arma_hot static typename T1::elem_type apply_unwrap(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X, const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T2>& Y);
00038   
00039   template<typename T1, typename T2>
00040   inline arma_hot static typename T1::elem_type apply_proxy (const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X, const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T2>& Y);
00041   };
